name: SingStar Pop Vol. 2
synopsis: SingStar Pop Vol.2 for the PlayStation 2 represents a wide variety of songs and videos from some of the hottest pop artists on the planet. Featuring hits from artists such as Fall Out Boy, Fergie, Rihanna, and more, Pop Vol.2 really brings the experience of being a pop star straight to your TV. So sing, compete, and keep the party going!
